item.title: Gs specs help
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

Thanks.

EDIT: well would it look like this after i added a misc random?

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(2890); specialAmount -= 50; getHit misc.random; specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655); }

is that right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2008, 12:32:36 am[/size][hr][quote=“iceman327, post:6, topic:245511”]add a miscrandom hit to your getHit[/quote]i added a miscrandom to it, no matter how i put it i always get errors :|, heres what it is when i add miscrandom

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 150){ setAnimation(2890); specialAmount -= 50; getHit(50)+misc.random; specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655); }
i always get errors no matter how i put it.Or do i take out the . in misc.random?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2008, 01:58:09 pm[/size][hr]Someone help please…?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2008, 10:54:34 pm[/size][hr]Someone help please…

item.title: Gs specs help
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

Well im trying to increase the max hit of the ags special on my server, and the probability that it will hit the max hit.

heres the code for the special in client.java

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(2890); specialAmount -= 50; getHit(70); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655); }

someone help please?

Read full topic
